item.title: [PI] Completionist cape is see through [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Dragonxile, post:3, topic:412410”]Alright here are some images, One is me wearing it the other 1 is what it looks like in my bag

[/quote]

I believe it’s a problem with the model. I think what happened is that the cape has a higher priority than the other faces (platebody) for being rendered, so it’s being rendered in the front. Although, I’m not a model expert, so that is just going on what I know.

item.title: [PI] Completionist cape is see through [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Dragonxile, post:1, topic:412410”]Ok so when i wear my completionist cape i can see right through my body, No matter what gear i wear i can still see through it could someone please help?? here are my ints for it if it helps…

case 15121: itemDef.modelid = 65270; itemDef.name = "Completionist cape"; itemDef.modelZoom = 1316; itemDef.modelRotationX = 252; itemDef.modelRotationY = 1020; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 24; itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.value = 19264; itemDef.membersObject = true; itemDef.anInt165 = 65297; itemDef.anInt200 = 65316; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Customise"; itemDef.itemActions[3] = "Features"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Destroy"; itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[4]; itemDef.newModelColor = new int[4]; itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 65214; itemDef.editedModelColor[1] = 65200; itemDef.editedModelColor[2] = 65186; itemDef.editedModelColor[3] = 62995; itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 65214; itemDef.newModelColor[1] = 65200; itemDef.newModelColor[2] = 65186; itemDef.newModelColor[3] = 62995; break;

I really need this fixed
I’ll post models if needed to[/quote]

If you could post a picture of what it looks like in game, it might help us better help you.

Read full topic
